title: 2020 Polling: Biden Lead, Trump and COVID
itunes:title: 2020 Polling: Biden Lead, Trump and COVID
description:
Guests: Mario Parker, Bloomberg White House reporter, Eric Weiner, Bloomberg Markets Live Team Leader, Scott Tranter, CEO of 0ptimus and former Data Science Director for Marco Rubio for President, Louise Schiavone, Journalist and Senior Lecturer at Johns Hopkins University Carey Business School, Eli Yokley, Senior Reporter, covering politics at Morning Consult, and Keith Krach, Undersecretary of State for Economic Growth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
